text: Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora sampradaya! Koraacona tomaloke, ma'i yadi mora pratipalakara paraa praeraita pramanata pratisthita thako arau te'om yadi moka te'omra taraphara paraa anugraha dana karai thake, arau seya tomalokara ocarata gopana rakha haya, tente ma'i tomalokara oparata tomaloke apachanda karaa satbe'o seya japi diba parao ne’
